arts.ttl: Skipper of yacht in fatal Mallorca accident in court
arts.sum: Dennis Viehof was sailing with a group of friends on board his father’s 20-metre luxury yacht, ‘La Luna’, and flying the German flag, when, off Cap Pinar, it ran over the small boat in which Guiem was fishing with his uncle and his cousin. The yacht skipper who allegedly killed a young man in Cala Bona told a Manacor on Monday that he did not realise what he had done and that he had not been drinking .

arts.sum: Upon hearing the news, actor Sir Roger Moore, who worked with Hamilton on James Bond instalments Live And Let Die (1973) and The Man With The Golden Gun (1974) took to Twitter to share his respects for the filmmaker.
